mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no scheduleNo ,member_no memberNo ,schedule schedule ,to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate ,to_char(end_date + interval '1' day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate ,color color FROM CALENDAR WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT schedule_no scheduleNo ,member_no memberNo ,schedule schedule ,to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate ,to_char(end_date + interval '1' day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate ,color FROM CALENDAR WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND #{date} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE

choose.when: SELECT SCHEDULE_NO scheduleNo ,MEMBER_NO memberNo ,SCHEDULE schedule ,TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE + interval '1' day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate ,COLOR color ,B.CLASS_NO classNo ,CLASS_NAME className FROM CALENDAR A JOIN CALENDAR_CLASS B USING(SCHEDULE_NO) JOIN CLASSROOM C ON(B.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO) WHERE B.CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS_MEMBER JOIN CLASSROOM USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE STUDENT_NO = #{memberNo})

SELECT SCHEDULE_NO scheduleNo ,MEMBER_NO memberNo ,SCHEDULE schedule ,TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE + interval '1' day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate ,B.CLASS_NO classNo ,CLASS_NAME className FROM CALENDAR A JOIN CALENDAR_CLASS B USING(SCHEDULE_NO) JOIN CLASSROOM C ON(B.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO) WHERE B.CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASSROOM WHERE TEACHER_NO = #{memberNo})
